expo.name: onRun
expo.description: onRun garnishes your athletic results, and welcomes you to an amazing community!

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: onRun requires access to your camera to let you add pictures to post to your feed.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: onRun needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: onRun needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: onRun requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where races near you are.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: onRun requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where races near you are.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: onRun requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where races near you are.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: onRun requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you where races near you are.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
